Name: Adaptability
Effect: Powers up moves of the same type.

Name: Aftermath
Effect: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

Name: Air Lock
Effect: Eliminates the effects of weather.

Name: Anger Point
Effect: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

Name: Anticipation
Effect: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

Name: Arena Trap
Effect: Prevents the foe from fleeing.

Name: Bad Dreams
Effect: Reduces a sleeping foe's HP.

Name: Battle Armor
Effect: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

Name: Blaze
Effect: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

Name: Chlorophyll
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

Name: Clear Body
Effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Name: Cloud Nine
Effect: Eliminates the effects of weather.

Name: Color Change
Effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.

Name: Compound Eyes
Effect: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

Name: Cute Charm
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

Name: Damp
Effect: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

Name: Download
Effect: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.

Name: Drizzle
Effect: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

Name: Drought
Effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

Name: Dry Skin
Effect: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

Name: Early Bird
Effect: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

Name: Effect Spore
Effect: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

Name: Filter
Effect: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.

Name: Flame Body
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

Name: Flash Fire
Effect: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

Name: Flower Gift
Effect: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

Name: Forecast
Effect: Castform transforms with the weather.

Name: Forewarn
Effect: Determines what moves a foe has.

Name: Frisk
Effect: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

Name: Gluttony
Effect: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

Name: Guts
Effect: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

Name: Heatproof
Effect: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

Name: Honey Gather
Effect: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

Name: Huge Power
Effect: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

Name: Hustle
Effect: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

Name: Hydration
Effect: Heals status problems if it is raining.

Name: Hyper Cutter
Effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

Name: Ice Body
Effect: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

Name: Illuminate
Effect: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

Name: Immunity
Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

Name: Inner Focus
Effect: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

Name: Insomnia
Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

Name: Intimidate
Effect: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

Name: Iron Fist
Effect: Boosts the power of punching moves.

Name: Keen Eye
Effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

Name: Klutz
Effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

Name: Leaf Guard
Effect: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

Name: Levitate
Effect: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

Name: Lightning Rod
Effect: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

Name: Limber
Effect: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

Name: Liquid Ooze
Effect: Damages attackers using any draining move.

Name: Magic Guard
Effect: Protects the Pokémon from indirect damage.

Name: Magma Armor
Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

Name: Magnet Pull
Effect: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.

Name: Marvel Scale
Effect: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.

Name: Minus
Effect: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Name: Mold Breaker
Effect: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

Name: Motor Drive
Effect: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

Name: Multitype
Effect: Changes type to match the held Plate.

Name: Natural Cure
Effect: All status problems heal when it switches out.

Name: No Guard
Effect: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

Name: Normalize
Effect: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.

Name: Oblivious
Effect: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

Name: Overgrow
Effect: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

Name: Own Tempo
Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

Name: Pickup
Effect: The Pokémon may pick up items.

Name: Plus
Effect: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Name: Poison Heal
Effect: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

Name: Poison Point
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

Name: Pressure
Effect: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

Name: Pure Power
Effect: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

Name: Quick Feet
Effect: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

Name: Rain Dish
Effect: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

Name: Reckless
Effect: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

Name: Rivalry
Effect: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

Name: Rock Head
Effect: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

Name: Rough Skin
Effect: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

Name: Run Away
Effect: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

Name: Sand Stream
Effect: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

Name: Sand Veil
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

Name: Scrappy
Effect: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

Name: Serene Grace
Effect: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

Name: Shadow Tag
Effect: Prevents the foe from escaping.

Name: Shed Skin
Effect: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

Name: Shell Armor
Effect: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

Name: Shield Dust
Effect: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

Name: Simple
Effect: Doubles all stat changes.

Name: Skill Link
Effect: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

Name: Slow Start
Effect: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.

Name: Sniper
Effect: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

Name: Snow Cloak
Effect: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

Name: Snow Warning
Effect: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

Name: Solar Power
Effect: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

Name: Solid Rock
Effect: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.

Name: Soundproof
Effect: Gives immunity to sound-based moves.

Name: Speed Boost
Effect: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

Name: Stall
Effect: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

Name: Static
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

Name: Steadfast
Effect: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

Name: Stench
Effect: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

Name: Sticky Hold
Effect: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

Name: Storm Drain
Effect: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

Name: Sturdy
Effect: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

Name: Suction Cups
Effect: Negates all moves that force switching out.

Name: Super Luck
Effect: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

Name: Swarm
Effect: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

Name: Swift Swim
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

Name: Synchronize
Effect: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

Name: Tangled Feet
Effect: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

Name: Technician
Effect: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

Name: Thick Fat
Effect: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

Name: Tinted Lens
Effect: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

Name: Torrent
Effect: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

Name: Trace
Effect: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

Name: Truant
Effect: Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

Name: Unaware
Effect: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

Name: Unburden
Effect: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

Name: Vital Spirit
Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

Name: Volt Absorb
Effect: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

Name: Water Absorb
Effect: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

Name: Water Veil
Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

Name: White Smoke
Effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Name: Wonder Guard
Effect: Only supereffective moves will hit.
